name: Fidget Spinner Champ
description:
Become the next Fidget Spinner Champ! Put your fidget spinning skills to the test.

[3 Game Modes]
• Original - Endless. Spin for as long as you want
• Time's Up - You have 30s to get as many spins as possible
• Target - You have 3s to spin. Spinner has to stop within the target range to win

[Features]
• 24 New Fidget Spinners to Unlock
• 3 Game Modes - Original, Time's Up, Target
• Collect Gems for New Fidget Spinners
• Leaderboard to challenge your Friends and Family
• More coming soon..

For more latest news and updates on #fidgetspinnerchamp, follow us here:
